org.hps.analysis.MC

Class TrackRefitWithFirstLayerHits

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.analysis.MC.TrackRefitWithFirstLayerHits

  • public class TrackRefitWithFirstLayerHits
extends Driver
    This driver selects all 3D hits in the first layer of the track (L1 or L2), and refits on all 3D hits in that layer. This seed track can be fed to "FirstHitGBLRefitterDriver" to do a GBL Refit.
